name: Bristol Ground School
about: Bristol Groundschool, located in Clevedon, Somerset, England, is a leading provider of aviation theory training, specializing in EASA and UK CAA ATPL, CPL, IR, and PPL courses. With over 20 years of experience, BGS offers modular distance learning programs that can be studied online or through a hybrid model, incorporating self-study phases, weekend accelerator courses, and revision sessions. Their award-winning ATPL theory training and comprehensive question bank, BGSonline, ensure high pass rates, often exceeding 95%. As an EASA examination centre, BGS continuously updates its material based on student feedback. The school is also a founder of the Wings Alliance, providing a supported pathway to airline employment. With a global network of over 150 partner schools, BGS is committed to delivering the best and most up-to-date learning materials, ensuring students achieve success in their aviation careers.
